pullRequest.title: Support determine isPreviousLoadFinished for some alter jobs in table level
pullRequest.bodyText: This PR is to reduce the time cost for waiting transactions to be completed in same db by filter the running transactions in table level.

nodes.bodyText: the method is low efficiency, use sourceTableIdList.retainAll(targetTableIdList);sourceTableIdList.isEmpty() instread?

commit.message: Support Judging isPreviousTransactionsFinished in table level
Support Judging isPreviousTransactionsFinished in table level

nodes.bodyText: init tableIdList to new list. empty list size is also zero, then we don't need this if else.
How about using a HashSet to speed up the find?
